channel.title: CVE Feed for veraPDF -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for veraPDF -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-28109|2024-08-02T00:48:48.254Z -- verapdf -- verapdf-library
item.description: veraPDF-library is a PDF/A validation library. Executing policy checks using custom schematron files invokes an XSL transformation that could lead to a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-28109|2024-03-28T13:19:39.906Z -- verapdf -- verapdf-library
